thread.title: Great place to stay
thread.title_full: Great place to stay - Review of Hotel Santa Costanza, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: MarjonBainbridge
title: Great place to stay
text: Great location, just outside the city center but easy to reach by bus and metro, a 10 minute trip from Termini! The room and bed were very comfortabel. Staff was very friendly and helpful. Some super restaurants and caf√©s in the area where the locals come, with great food and drinks! We will definitely go back!!!
